subject: #QFXQUZKC8
description_text:
Hello, the pedals have arrived and they are working great.

The rumble motors are having issues.. one of the motors rattles, like there
is something loose inside, and one doesn't work.

One does work and it works great, I have tried the working one in each of
the sockets and it works in all three sockets. The one that doesn't work
just doesn't vibrate and the one that rattles makes an awful sound and
smells like burning plastic.

I'm pretty sure 2 out of the three are faulty, as the working one works
well in each slot.


What should I do? As I think 2 of them will need replacing.

I appreciate any help you can give me.

Order number #QFXQUZKC8

Kind regards,
Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt radford,     We sent the shipping information to this email address you filled in: pogonophile@live.com   Do you need us to change it to this email address for you?  Here is the link to your logistics tracking: https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045804559444,YT2519600703061066

Actually yes,  i think it changed my email with auto complete.
I am having issues with that email address. Could you change forward it on
to audiosyphilis@gmail.com.

Sorry about that.
Kind regards,
Matt
Hi Matt radford,     Ok, we've changed it for you but can't resend the shipping notification, you can track it through this link . https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045804559444,YT2519600703061066

Hello, the pedals have arrived and they are working great.

The rumble motors are having issues.. one of the motors rattles, like there
is something loose inside, and one doesn't work.

One does work and it works great, I have tried the working one in each of
the sockets and it works in all three sockets. The one that doesn't work
just doesn't vibrate and the one that rattles makes an awful sound and
smells like burning plastic.

I'm pretty sure 2 out of the three are faulty, as the working one works
well in each slot.


What should I do? As I think 2 of them will need replacing.

I appreciate any help you can give me.

Kind regards,
Matt

Hi Matt radford,  Please upgrade SIMSONN Manager to version 2.0.9, which will limit the VAM motor to the correct force range. Exceeding 50% force may damage the motor, as it doesn’t require that much power. Also, please keep the SimHub setting below 50%. Additionally, please provide us with a video, and we will arrange to send you a replacement motor.

Hello I have attached a video on this link to show the two faulty motors.

The one on the brake is just dead, just doesn't activate. Just no vibrations

The one I've got attached to nothing sounds like it's grinding and has  a
rattly sound. This is the one that smells like burning plastic

The one on the throttle is fine, no issues what soever.

I've tried switching them round into different slots to check it's the
motor rather than any other issues. And it seems to be the motors.

Just to make it simple, 1 works perfectly, one doesn't work and the 3rd
sounds awful, and smells like burning when it shakes.

All settings are 50% or under


Kind regards,
Matt

合并来自工单1912  
      主题: Ticket Received - #QFXQUZKC8  
      描述:  Hello I have attached a video on this link to show the two faulty motors.   
 The one on the brake is just dead, just doesn't activate. Just no vibrations 
   
 The one I've got attached to nothing sounds like it's grinding and has  a rattly sound. This is the one that smells like burning plastic 
   
 The one on the throttle is fine, no issues what soever.  
   
 I've tried switching them round into different slots to check it's the motor rather than any other issues. And it seems to be the motors. 
   
 Just to make it simple, 1 works perfectly, one doesn't work and the 3rd sounds awful, and smells like burning when it shakes. 
   
 All settings are 50% or under 
   
   
 Kind regards, 
 Matt

Hi Matt radford,  Please provide your order number so that we can arrange to send you two brand-new VAM motors. Also, which pedal control box are you using? We recommend avoiding long-term use of telemetry data such as RPM and Speed that cause the motor to run continuously at high speed, as this may reduce the lifespan of the VAM (VAM Pro is not affected).

The order number is in the message, but I shall copy it here to assist ?
Order number #QFXQUZKC8.

Kind regards,
Matt
Hi Matt radford,    I believe I’m working on a replacement order. Could you please send me the ticket and order details so I can confirm?
Hi Matt radford,    Could you please take a screenshot of the page showing the order number? The one you provided doesn’t seem to be a standard order number, and I’m unable to locate it.

Hello, I didn't get sent anything but I took a screen shot when I ordered.  So this is the only reference I have. The delivery address was 83 Ashburnham road, Luton, LU11JN.     Is that enough for you to find my order?

合并来自工单2065  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN2005, how did it go?  
      描述:  I'm awaiting a replacement part before I put an update, the pedal themselves are great, but 2 out of the 3 rumble motors don't work. Your team are replacing them hopefully, which if they do I'm sure the review will be great, but it's unfair to do a review prior to this.
